reference.shortdesc: The state element represents a named property that has a variable state value.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The state element is primarily intended for use in specializations. It could be used to represent logic circuit, chemical reaction, or airplane instrumentation states.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: Rendering expectation for the state element are entirely implementation-dependent.
